hero.title: Empowering Communities Through Technology
hero.subtitle: Shaping the future of AI education for everyone

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At KI-KL e.V., we empower individuals to navigate the transformative landscape of emerging technologies, equipping them with the knowledge and skills to adapt and thrive in a changing job market. By providing accessible education, resources, and a collaborative community, we break down barriers for those from diverse backgrounds, ensuring that technology serves the public good.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Empowering our community through accessible tools, innovative AI models, and hands-on workshops, we foster a collaborative environment where diverse skills flourish. By prioritizing citizen science and experiential learning, we bridge gaps, combat isolation, and inspire collective growth.

features.title: What We Offer
features.subtitle: Empowering individuals with knowledge and tools

workshops.title: Hands-on Workshops
workshops.description: Interactive learning experiences for all skill levels

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Developing ethical, transparent AI models for social good

accessibility.description: Making technology education available to everyone

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded with a vision to democratize AI education and empower communities

ethics.title: Ethical Technology
ethics.description: Committed to transparent, ethical AI development that serves the public good
